data.title: Employment – Wynantskill Union Free School District
data.text:
Bus Drivers

For Immediate Hire/Training:

The Wynantskill Union Free School District is seeking certified Bus Drivers, and applicants interested in paid training to become a Bus Driver. We will pay for all training! Please see Head of Transportation Mike Goyer’s Letter to the Community

$25/hour plus benefits for certified drivers.

$20/hour for driver trainees.

Certified Drivers follow the school calendar typically driving 5 days/week when school is in session. AM Bus Run- 2 hour shift between the approximate hours of 6:30 AM-8:30 AM PM Bus Run- 2 hour shift between the approximate hours of 1:30 PM-3:30 PM

Click here for our ​Bus Driver Application.

Please send all applications and questions to Mike Goyer at mgoyer@wynantskillufsd.org

Substitute Teachers

The Wynantskill Union Free School District is seeking Substitute Teacher, Teacher Aide and Building Aide applications for the 2024-2025 school year on a rolling basis.

We are searching for applicants who have a love for children and want to help out in the community! No prior teaching experience is necessary.

Salary: Certified Teacher $110/day, Non-Certified Individuals $100/day

Applications are now being accepted for the following positions:

Substitute Teacher (Certified)

Substitute Teacher (Non-Certified)

Substitute Educational/Building Aide

You may submit forms along with any supporting documents through OLAS portal, or email them to kbarber@wynantskillufsd.org
